name: Boppin' Bunnies
description: You’ve just accepted the job position of Magicians Assistant! But of course, you didn’t think it would be ALL fun and games, did you!? While checking out all the magical props you noticed the magician’s bunnies are hoppin’ in and out of the magic hats! They’ve accidentally gotten into the tricks and are in need of rescue! Tap the bunnies with the opposite effect hammer (ice to cool the fire, fire to melt the ice) to save the bunnies from peril. Just be sure not to bop any normal bunnies!
